page.title: 15A DAY IN A FARMER'S LIFE.
page.content: I am a dairy farmer.My day begins at about 5.00 a.m. each morning.I get up, have a drink of coffee,then I go to milk the cows.In the winter the cows are kept inside,but in the summertime they are in the fields so they have to be brought in.Milking takes about two hours.After milking I go to have my breakfast,between 8.30 and 9.00 a.m. In winter, the rest of the morning is spent feeding the cows and young stock,as well as cleaning out.In the summer the morning will be spent doing general farm work or harvesting. Afternoon milking begins at around 3.00 p.m. During the winter my day finishes at about 6.30 p.m.- but there is some office work to do.In the summer, work often goes on until dusk.Then I try to keep one afternoon per week free for office work.
